name: dumbdo
description: DumbDo is a basic self-hosted to-do list app. It focuses on straightforward task management with lists, completion status, and a clutter-free interface designed for users who want local control over their task data.
features: Task lists: Create multiple lists to organize tasks by project, context, or priority for structured workflow.
Completion tracking: Mark tasks as done and view completion history to monitor productivity over time.
Simple interface: Focus on task management without distractions from unnecessary features or complex navigation.
Local data storage: Keep all task information on your own server for privacy and control over personal data.
Quick entry: Add new tasks rapidly with minimal clicks to capture ideas and action items as they arise.
List management: Rename, delete, or reorder lists to adapt your organization system as needs change.
Mobile responsive: Access and update tasks from any device with a browser that adapts to screen size.
No dependencies: Run with minimal server requirements and no external services for straightforward deployment.
